Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (status == 404)              {                  return View("NotFound");              }

The following statement contains a magic number: app.Use((context' next) =>              {                  var builder = next();                    if (context.Response.StatusCode < 200 || context.Response.StatusCode >= 400)                  {                      string contentType;                      if (_contentTypeProvider.TryGetContentType(context.Request.Path' out contentType))                      {                          var statusCodePagesFeature = context.Features.Get<IStatusCodePagesFeature>();                          if (statusCodePagesFeature != null)                          {                              statusCodePagesFeature.Enabled = false;                          }                      }                  }                    return builder;              });
